"Dɛm ntsi sɛ hom enya nye Kraest asoɛr: "Hom mfa hom adwen ngyina dza ɔwɔ sor do
hom nhwehwɛ dza ɔwɔ sor beebi a Kraest: na nnyɛ dza ɔwɔ asaase do a."

"Dɛm ntsi sɛ hom enya nye Kraest asoɛr: "Na hom wui
hom nhwehwɛ dza ɔwɔ sor beebi a Kraest: na wɔdze hom nkwa aka Kraest ho esuma Nyankopɔn mu."

"Dɛm ntsi sɛ hom enya nye Kraest asoɛr: "Na ber a hom nkwa a ɔyɛ Kraest bɛda edzi no
hom nhwehwɛ dza ɔwɔ sor beebi a Kraest: hom so nye no bopue enyimnyam mu."

"Dɛm ntsi sɛ hom enya nye Kraest asoɛr: "Dɛm ntsi hom nku wiadze akɔndɔ a ɔwɔ hom mfafakuwa mu no; ndwamansɛm
hom nhwehwɛ dza ɔwɔ sor beebi a Kraest: efifidze
"#Dwom 110.1": akɔndɔ bɔn nye enyiber a no so yɛ abosonsɔr."

"Dɛm ntsi sɛ hom enya nye Kraest asoɛr: "Iyinom ntsi na Nyankopɔn ebufuw ba (seanntse mba do) ;"
hom nhwehwɛ dza ɔwɔ sor beebi a Kraest: "#3.6 Tsetse Akyerɛwfo no binom mmfa iyi nnsɔw do."

"Dɛm ntsi sɛ hom enya nye Kraest asoɛr: "dza nkan no a hom tse mu no hom nantseew mu no."
"Na afei so hom nyi yinom nyina ngu; ebufuw
hom nhwehwɛ dza ɔwɔ sor beebi a Kraest: ebufuhyew

"Dɛm ntsi sɛ hom enya nye Kraest asoɛr: "mma hom nndzidzi ator nnkyerɛkyerɛ homho
hom nhwehwɛ dza ɔwɔ sor beebi a Kraest: osiandɛ hom eyi nyimpa dadaw no nye ne ndzeyɛe no egu;"

"Dɛm ntsi sɛ hom enya nye Kraest asoɛr: "na hom ahyɛ nyimpa fofor a wɔayɛ no fofor aba nyimdzee mapa mu
hom nhwehwɛ dza ɔwɔ sor beebi a Kraest: a ogyina nyia ɔbɔɔ no no ne saso do no;"

"Dɛm ntsi sɛ hom enya nye Kraest asoɛr: "mbrɛ Griiknyi nye Jewnyi
hom nhwehwɛ dza ɔwɔ sor beebi a Kraest: twatsiatwa nye monomonomyɛ
column7: na mbom Kraest nye adze nyina wɔ hɔn nyina mu no."

"Dɛm ntsi sɛ hom enya nye Kraest asoɛr: "Dɛm ntsi hom a hom yɛ hɔn a Nyankopɔn asan mu eyi hom
hom nhwehwɛ dza ɔwɔ sor beebi a Kraest: ahotseweefo nye adɔfo no

"Dɛm ntsi sɛ hom enya nye Kraest asoɛr: "Sɛ obi wɔ obi ho asɛm bi a
hom nhwehwɛ dza ɔwɔ sor beebi a Kraest: hom ntsetse mma homho
wɔ Nyankopɔn abanyimfa no.": na hom mfa nkyekyɛ homho nkorkor; dɛ mbrɛ Kraest dze akyɛ hom no

"Dɛm ntsi sɛ hom enya nye Kraest asoɛr: "na iyinom nyina do no hom nhyɛ ɔdɔ a ɔma ndzɛmba nyina wie pɛyɛ no."
"Na hom mma Kraest asomdwee no ndzi hen wɔ hom akoma mu
hom nhwehwɛ dza ɔwɔ sor beebi a Kraest: ɔno so na wɔafrɛ hom aba ho
wɔ Nyankopɔn abanyimfa no.": wɔ nyimpadua kor mu. Na mma hom nnyɛ etsiafo."

"Dɛm ntsi sɛ hom enya nye Kraest asoɛr: "Hom mma Kraest n'asɛm no ntsena hom mu pii
hom nhwehwɛ dza ɔwɔ sor beebi a Kraest: na hom mfa nsankundwom
column6: na hom nkasa nkyerɛ homho nkorkor ntow ndwom adom do wɔ hom akoma mu mma Nyankopɔn."

"Dɛm ntsi sɛ hom enya nye Kraest asoɛr: "Na biribiara a hom yɛ no
hom nhwehwɛ dza ɔwɔ sor beebi a Kraest: kasa mu o
"#Dwom 110.1": hom nyɛ ne nyina wɔ Ewuradze Jesus dzin mu
column6: na hom ndua no do nda Nyankopɔn Egya no ase."

"Dɛm ntsi sɛ hom enya nye Kraest asoɛr: "Yernom
hom nhwehwɛ dza ɔwɔ sor beebi a Kraest: hom mbrɛ homho adze mma hom kunnom
wɔ Nyankopɔn abanyimfa no.": dɛm na ɔsɛ wɔ Ewuradze mu."

"Dɛm ntsi sɛ hom enya nye Kraest asoɛr: "Kunnom
hom nhwehwɛ dza ɔwɔ sor beebi a Kraest: hom ndɔ hom yernom na mma hom nnyɛ hɔn yerɛyerɛw."

"Dɛm ntsi sɛ hom enya nye Kraest asoɛr: "Mba
hom nhwehwɛ dza ɔwɔ sor beebi a Kraest: hom ntsie hom awofo asɛm wɔ adze nyina mu na iyi na ɔsɔ enyi wɔ Ewuradze mu."

"Dɛm ntsi sɛ hom enya nye Kraest asoɛr: "Egyanom
hom nhwehwɛ dza ɔwɔ sor beebi a Kraest: mma hom nnyɛ hom mba heihei amma hɔn abaw mu aanngow."

"Dɛm ntsi sɛ hom enya nye Kraest asoɛr: "Nkowaa
hom nhwehwɛ dza ɔwɔ sor beebi a Kraest: hom ntsie hom honam afamu ewuranom asɛm wɔ adze nyina mu; nnyɛ enyiwadosom mu

"Dɛm ntsi sɛ hom enya nye Kraest asoɛr: "na biribiara a hom yɛ no
hom nhwehwɛ dza ɔwɔ sor beebi a Kraest: hom mfi akoma mu nyɛ edwuma dɛ hom yɛ ma Ewuradze

"Dɛm ntsi sɛ hom enya nye Kraest asoɛr: "osiandɛ hom nyim dɛ Ewuradze hɔ na hom benya egyapadze akatua no
hom nhwehwɛ dza ɔwɔ sor beebi a Kraest: osiandɛ Ewuradze Kraest na hom som no."

"Dɛm ntsi sɛ hom enya nye Kraest asoɛr: "Na nyia ɔyɛ dza ɔnntsen no
hom nhwehwɛ dza ɔwɔ sor beebi a Kraest: dza ɔnntsen a ɔayɛ no ara na obenya bio: na nyimpa enyimhwɛ bi nnyi hɔ."
